description:
A simple, easy-to-use SSH terminal tool

T-Shell (TheBlindShell) is a configurable command-prompt terminal emulator and SSH client, currently only supported for Windows.
- Integrate SSH
- Native operation (under design)
- Customizable themes and color schemes (under design)
- Shortcut command prompts: Write once, run everywhere.
- Support for Linux terminals such as bash and zsh.
- Chinese language support
- Support SFTP
